description.narrative: Integrated Diagnostics Holding Plc. (IDH or the Company) is a leading diagnostic service provider in the Middle East and Africa (MEA) region offering pathology and radiology services in Egypt, Jordan, Sudan and Nigeria. The Company has a 40-year track record and is a trusted and quality provider of diagnostics services with internationally recognized accreditations (ISO, CAP and JCI). IDH offers over 2,000 diagnostic tests under 7 key brands with strong reputation in underserved markets. As of September 30, 2020, IDH has a network of 471 branches and employs over 5,500 employees across its geographic footprint. IDH is a Jersey registered public limited company listed on the London Stock Exchange (LSE) since May 2015. IDHs investment plans include expansion plans in Egypt and new acquisitions and greenfield investments in other emerging markets as well as achieving a dual listing of its shares on the Egyptian Stock Exchange (EGX) (the Project).

The proposed Project has an Anticipated Impact Measurement and Monitoring (AIMM) rating of Good, based on an AIMM score of 43. On an unadjusted basis (i.e., without likelihood factor), the full potential AIMM score could reach 64. The most significant, expected Project-level outcome is the benefit to patients from the provision of high-quality healthcare. Beyond the Project, IFC anticipates that the investment has the potential to promote greater inclusiveness in Egypt's labor market through demonstration and capacity-building channels.

name.narrative: The headquarters of IDH and majority of its operations are located in Egypt, in addition to regional operations in Jordan, Nigeria and Sudan.
